Class FixedRootFolderProvider

java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
implements IRootFolderProvider

Copyright 2010 Eduard Gurskiy. All rights reserved. License BSD. Use is subject to license terms.
JBFileManager
Static root folder provider. Returns always the same root folder, which is preconfigured in JBFM servlet.

Author:
Eduard Gurskiy
